CV

Basics

Name Ekim Luo
Label Scientist
Email yl756@cam.ac.uk
Url https://ekimluo.github.io/
Summary Using a mixed-methods approach to understand the individual differences and social factors that shape pain perception.

Work

  • 2022 - 2023
    Visiting Research Fellow
    Social Cognitive and Affective Neuroscience Unit (SCAN-Unit)
    Supervised by Dr. Ronald Sladsky and Prof. Claus Lamm to get trained on techniques and experimental approaches related to functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI).
  • 2021 - Present
    Bioinformatics Instructor
    Bioinformatics Training Facility, Department of Genetics
    Taught and assisted on data science courses to postgraduate students and postdoctoral researchers within the School of Biological Sciences at the University of Cambridge, specifically using R, Python and Bash. List of courses taught and assisted include the following:
    • Introduction to R and Tidyverse
    • Core Statistics
    • Introduction to Python
    • Introduction to Working with UNIX and Bash
    • Reproducible Research Using R and Git
    • Introduction to Machine Learning
  • 2018 - 2019
    Research Assistant
    Brain and Creativity Institute, University of Southern California
  • 2018 - 2020
    Research Assistant
    Neuroendocrinology of Social Ties Lab, University of Southern California
    Supervised by Prof. Darby Saxbe and Dr. Mona Khaled, I conducted qualitative coding and analysis of couples' conflict interactions and parenting stress.
